titles.title: Electing a Member to a certain standing committee of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/2/2011--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Elects a specified named Member to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
